amendment.description: Expressing the sense of the Senate that the United States should use the authorities of the Commodity Credit Corporation to provide additional international food aid.

vote.text: Amendment SA 116 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 116 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Leahy. (consideration: CR S1433-1438) Expressing the sense of the Senate that the United States should use the authorities of the Commodity Credit Corporation to provide additional international food aid.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 116 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 116 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Leahy.
